name: Intro Project
description:
First time making a game. it is a simple game where you have to watch out for the other cars to get to the end. The numbers at the top show how far you have gone the higher the numbers the farther you have gone. If you hit a car or fall of the game auto restarts same when you get to the end.

Sometimes when it launches in full screen you cant move just refresh the page and you can move. 

Controls: Use (a) and (d) keys to move left and right.
